description: Bitbucket is a Git-based code hosting and collaboration platform supporting private and public repositories, enabling teams to manage and review code through pull requests and integrations

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_CREATE_BRANCH
capabilities.description: Creates a new branch in a Bitbucket repository from a target commit hash; the branch name must be unique, adhere to Bitbucket's naming conventions, and not include the 'refs/heads/' prefix.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_CREATE_ISSUE
capabilities.description: Creates a new issue in a Bitbucket repository, setting the authenticated user as reporter; ensures assignee (if provided) has repository access, and that any specified milestone, version, or component IDs exist.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_CREATE_ISSUE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Adds a new comment with markdown support to an existing Bitbucket issue.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_CREATE_PULL_REQUEST
capabilities.description: Creates a new pull request in a specified Bitbucket repository, ensuring the source branch exists and is distinct from the (optional) destination branch.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_CREATE_REPOSITORY
capabilities.description: Creates a new Bitbucket 'git' repository in a specified workspace, defaulting to the workspace's oldest project if `project_key` is not provided.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_CREATE_SNIPPET_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Posts a new top-level comment or a threaded reply to an existing comment on a specified Bitbucket snippet.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_DELETE_ISSUE
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a specific issue, identified by its `issue_id`, from the repository specified by `repo_slug` within the given `workspace`.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_DELETE_REPOSITORY
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes a specified Bitbucket repository; this action is irreversible and does not affect forks.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_GET_CURRENT_USER
capabilities.description: Retrieves the profile information (UUID, display name, links, creation date) for the currently authenticated Bitbucket user.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_GET_FILE_FROM_REPOSITORY
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific file's content from a Bitbucket repository at a given commit (hash, branch, or tag), failing if the file path is invalid for that commit.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_GET_PULL_REQUEST
capabilities.description: Get a single pull request by ID with complete details.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_GET_SNIPPET
capabilities.description: Retrieves a specific Bitbucket snippet by its encoded ID from an existing workspace, returning its metadata and file structure.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_LIST_PULL_REQUESTS
capabilities.description: Lists pull requests in a specified, accessible Bitbucket repository, optionally filtering by state (OPEN, MERGED, DECLINED).

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_LIST_REPOSITORIES_IN_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Lists repositories in a specified Bitbucket workspace, accessible to the authenticated user, with options to filter by role or query string, and sort results.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_LIST_WORKSPACE_MEMBERS
capabilities.description: Lists all members of a specified Bitbucket workspace; the workspace must exist.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_LIST_WORKSPACES
capabilities.description: Lists Bitbucket workspaces accessible to the authenticated user, optionally filtered and sorted.

capabilities.name: BITBUCKET_UPDATE_ISSUE
capabilities.description: Updates an existing issue in a Bitbucket repository by modifying specified attributes; requires `workspace`, `repo_slug`, `issue_id`, and at least one attribute to update.
